dn.configuration.title: Display Notches Config
tooltip.dn.axe: - Flip the item between horizontal or vertical with an Axe
tooltip.dn.glass: - Make the notch invisible with a Glass Block
tooltip.dn.glow_ink_sac: - Make the item glow with a Glow Inc Sac
tooltip.dn.phantom_membrane: - Make the notch non-solid with a Phantom Membrane
tooltip.dn.pickaxe: - Rotate the item with a Pickaxe
tooltip.dn.redstone_torch: - Make the item continuously rotate by using a Redstone Torch
tooltip.dn.shovel: - Change the item's elevation using a Shovel
tooltip.dn.signal: - Make the item continuously rotate by powering it with a Redstone Signal
tooltip.dn.start: Once an Item is inserted, you can manipulate it:
tooltip.dn.tripwire_hook: - Lock the notch with a Tripwire Hook
